description: Try our easy to follow Hearty Asian Chicken Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hearty Asian Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a wok over a high heat. Add oil and swirl around wok to coat.
Add chicken and stir-fry for 3 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a plate. Reheat wok, adding extra oil if required, and stir-fry remaining portions of chicken.

Add onion, garlic and ginger to wok and stir-fry for 2 minutes or until soft. Pour chicken stock, 2 cups of water, coconut milk, chilli jam relish, lime juice and fish sauce into the wok. Stir until combined and bring to the boil.
Add fettuccine and cook for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Return chicken to wok, stir and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Transfer soup to bowls. Top with coriander sprigs and chilli.
